name: jianastrero/jugger-api
description: Jugger API makes creating API's the easiest way possible on laravel. It runs together with your app and can be found at http://yourdomain.com/jugger-api. It depends on Passport and VueJS. Laravel Passport for OAuth for API's, and VueJS for the web to create your API's. Jugger API follows best practices for API development.
